'''Violetgrass''' is a [[Local Specialty]] found in the wild all over [[Liyue]].

==How to Obtain==
Violetgrass grows on the cliffsides of various mountainous regions throughout Liyue.

See the gallery or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=34 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

Additionally, the following NPCs give Violetgrass after following a certain dialogue branch for the first time:
*[[Mengmeng]] in [[Dihua Marsh]], [[Liyue]] (5 Violetgrass)
